data.title: Tobacco Watcher
data.text:
85,600 units of cigarettes from Haiti seized at the border

04/17/2024 minutoaminuto.com.do

By: Goidy Reyes Dajabón RD.- Military personnel from the Specialized Corps for Land Border Security CESFRONT and the Dominican Army in a joint operation seized 85,600 units of cigarettes from Haiti in the border province of Dajabón. The confiscation of the cigarettes by the military was carried out in an abandoned house located in the La Bomba neighborhood of the municipality of Dajabon. So far, the authorities have not reported whether there were any arrests for the cigarette smuggling. The seized merchandise was transferred to the Cesfront Long Sheet Battle Border Operations Base for the corresponding purposes.
